body:
Hello {{RECIPIENT_NAME}},

My name is Chinmay Shringi. I understand your time is valuable, so I’ll keep it brief.
I came across your information on LinkedIn and wanted to reach out.

I am:

	- A full-stack developer with over 5 years of industry experience.
	- Currently pursuing a Master’s in Computer Engineering at New York University (NYU).

I am interested in a Summer Internship in 2025 at Mindtree. Here’s what I bring to the table:

	- A strong passion for technology innovation and hands-on experience in developing and optimizing software solutions.
	- The ability to contribute to impactful projects, particularly leveraging my skills in automation, software engineering, and cloud technologies.

Thank you for considering my application. I would be thrilled to discuss how I could contribute to your team.

Best regards,
Chinmay Shringi
+1(201) 284-0211
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/chinmay-shringi-105736173/
GitHub: https://github.com/ChinmayShringi
My Website: https://chinmayshringi.web.app/
subject: Strong Candidate with Cutting-Edge SDE Skills
